name: rotating-file-stream
description: Opens a stream.Writable to a file rotated by interval and/or size. A logrotate alternative.

scripts.all: npm run eslint && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: tsc && TZ="Europe/Rome" nyc -r lcov -r text -r text-summary -r html mocha -r ts-node/register test/*ts
scripts.prepare: npm run ignore && tsc && npm run readme
scripts.test: npm run clean && mocha -r ts-node/register test/*ts
